name: 张无忌
bio: Lord of Winterfell and head of House Stark. He married Lady Lysa Locke, with whom he had two sons

children.name: 刘德华
children.bio: Lord of Winterfell and head of House Stark. The eldest son of Lord Benjen Stark and Lady Lysa Locke. He married Lady Gilliane Glover and had one son.

children.name: 刘德华
children.bio: Eldest son of Lord Cregan Stark & Lady Arra Norrey. Married Lady Jeyne Manderly. Fought under Targaryen banner during the Conquest of Dorne. His death outside of Sunspear in one of the final battles was lamented in the North for years due to trouble that dogged his half brothers' reigns.
